title: Nova's Michael 'Wippa' Wipfli 'is being stalked by a female listener'
text:
Nova FM breakfast host Michael 'Wippa' Wipfli is reportedly being stalked by a female listener.

According to New Idea, the woman is so obsessed with the 40-year-old radio presenter that she has 'bombarded him with text messages' and even 'gatecrashed' industry events to get close to him.

'It's become serious very quickly and who knows what this stalker will do next,' a source told the magazine.

'It's become serious very quickly': Nova FM breakfast host Michael 'Wippa' Wipfli (pictured) is reportedly being stalked by a female listener

While Michael is known for his laid-back persona as host of Sydney's Fitzy & Wippa, he has allegedly been left 'shaken' by his stalker.

In a bid to protect himself and his wife Lisa, who is pregnant with the couple's third child, Michael has reportedly taken 'extreme security measures'.

He has also consulted with police about how to handle a possible 'face-to-face encounter' with the woman.

Daily Mail Australia has contacted Nova FM's publicity department for comment.

Ordeal: The woman is so obsessed with Michael (pictured with his wife, Lisa) that she has 'bombarded him with texts' and even 'gatecrashed' industry events to get close to him

Last month, Michael and Lisa confirmed they will be expecting their third child together in April next year.

The pair shared a sweet video of their sons Ted, four, and Jack, three, announcing the news by yelling out: 'We're going to be big brothers!'

Lisa captioned the clip: 'It's a cryptic message... can you work out what they're saying? I think they're pretty excited about the news.'

Stalker: While Michael is known for his laid-back persona as host of Sydney's Fitzy & Wippa, he has allegedly been left 'shaken' by his stalker. Pictured with his co-host, Ryan Fitzgerald

Earlier this month, Michael revealed the gender of their unborn child.

With the help of his radio co-host, Ryan 'Fitzy' Fitzgerald, he threw a 'bogan' gender reveal party at Sydney's Dragway drag racing facility.

He shared footage to Instagram of Fitzy doing a burnout in an old V8 Commodore, with pink smoke billowing from the car to confirm the baby is a girl.
description: Nova FM breakfast host Michael 'Wippa' Wipfli, 40, is reportedly being stalked by a female listener.
authors: Monique Friedlander For Daily Mail Australia
